# Microservice Specification Template (Advanced)

Service
- Name

Purpose
- Business capability implemented

Context
- System architecture context
- Bounded context description

Service Boundaries
- What this service owns

API Contract
- Use REST API template per endpoint

Data Models
- Entities or database schema references

Dependencies
- Internal services: needs and contracts
- External services: integration details

Configuration
- Parameters and defaults

Deployment Requirements
- Runtime/platform, resources, scaling

Observability
- Logging: events and context
- Metrics: key business/system metrics
- Tracing: distributed tracing requirements
- Health checks: endpoints and logic

Inter-Service Communication
- Pattern (sync/async), protocol, retries, error handling

Edge Cases
- Case: Expected behaviour
- Case: Expected behaviour

Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion
- [ ] Criterion

Non-Functional Requirements
- Response time, availability, throughput, security
